introduction: Hi, I am a web developer specializing in React. I offer professional development of websites and web applications. I have worked on many projects, from a carpooling application, to business websites, to an online TV platform.
aboutDescription: While my main focus is on front-end development, I also have experience with back-end technologies like NestJs and Python language.
educationSkill1: Theoretical and practical knowledge in automation, robotics, mechanics, and electronics
educationSkill2: Programming skills in both low-level (Assembler) and high-level (Python, C) languages
educationSkill3: Ability to work effectively in both large and small teams, strong problem solving skills
turmsSkill1: Developing carpooling web application serving approximately 100 users
turmsSkill2: Frontend: React, TypeScript, Material UI; Backend: NestJS, PostgreSQL, Prisma
turmsSkill3: Web sockets based real-time messages and notification systems
turmsSkill4: GitHub for version control and Trello for project management
codespotSkill1: Developing DotTv, a streaming application for watching TV and VOD content online
codespotSkill2: Working with team of developers using Github, Jira, Figma
codespotSkill5: Building responsive website, state management libraries, custom React Hooks
codespotSkill6: Working with authorization mechanisms, JSON Web Token
projectCarpoolingDescription: Carpooling web application currently serving around 100 users, offering a cost-effective solution with prices 35% lower than competitors.
projectSplitterDescription: Mobile IOS app project, created to divide costs between members of a group of friends.
projectPythonDescription: This is my engineering diploma thesis. App uses database of images to recognize people in static images or in real-time computer web camera image.
projectResumeDescription: Project of this website, self designed with Figma.
projectDotTvDescription: A web application designed for watching online television content. I worked on it as React developer during my time at Codespot.
projectMotoAdvisorDescription: Freelance project for KiliAuto, a company specializing in advising clients on purchasing used cars and motorcycles. I added SEO optimizations, which resulted in a 45% increase in monthly client acquisition.
